column86: value:"This news dataset is a persistent historical archive of noteable events in the Indian subcontinent from start-2001 to end-2020
column87: recorded in realtime by the journalists of India. It contains approximately 3.4 million events published by Times of India.\nTimes Group as a news agency
column88: reaches out a very wide audience across Asia and drawfs every other agency in the quantity of english articles published per day. Due to the heavy daily volume over multiple years
column89: this data offers a deep insight into Indian society
column92: issues and talking points and how they have unfolded over time. It is possible to chop this dataset into a smaller piece for a more focused analysis
column93: based on one or more facets."}
